### hasFixedOffset() {#acf43399e1cbcadbb63dd9b33a3eac938}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::OptimizedStructLayoutField::hasFixedOffset () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if this field has been assigned a fixed offset.

After layout, this will be true of all the fields.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/optimizedstructlayout-h/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/optimizedstructlayout-h">OptimizedStructLayout.h</a>.

### Offset {#adae4afc395aed3ab340d695de637dd11}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::OptimizedStructLayoutField::Offset</>}>
The offset of this field in the final layout.

If this is initialized to FlexibleOffset, layout will overwrite it with the assigned offset of the field.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/optimizedstructlayout-h/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/optimizedstructlayout-h">OptimizedStructLayout.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Scratch {#a432caecc9417394c69f599b6476febdb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void&#42; llvm::OptimizedStructLayoutField::Scratch</>}>
Private scratch space for the algorithm.

The implementation must treat this as uninitialized memory on entry.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/optimizedstructlayout-h/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/optimizedstructlayout-h">OptimizedStructLayout.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Size {#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::OptimizedStructLayoutField::Size</>}>
The required size of this field in bytes.

Does not have to be a multiple of Alignment. Must be non-zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/optimizedstructlayout-h/#l00063">63</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/optimizedstructlayout-h">OptimizedStructLayout.h</a>.
